full_summary:
=====================================

## Phase 2 EZ899-231228 RCMP Vancouver Island Headquarters - HVAC Replacement

### Solicitation Number: WS4413099589

* **Tender Closing Date:** 2024-04-02T14:00:00
* **Expected Contract Start Date:** 2024-03-13
* **Expected Contract End Date:** 2024-04-30

### Brief Description

We invite qualified suppliers to submit bids for the Phase 2 solicitation as part of the Invitation to Qualify process. The scope of work involves the provision of labour, materials, services, and equipment necessary for the HVAC Upgrade work at the RCMP Vancouver Island Headquarters in Victoria, British Columbia.

The successful bidder will be responsible for completing the project while ensuring the HVAC system remains operational 24/7 throughout the entire project duration, including the construction phase. Limited short-duration periods for existing system tie-ins with new systems will be permitted, subject to approval from the Departmental Representative.

### Procurement Details

* **Procurement Category:** CNST
* **Notice Type:** Invitation to Qualify
* **Procurement Method:** Competitive - Selective Tendering
* **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price
* **Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* **Regions of Opportunity:** None
* **Regions of Delivery:** British Columbia, Canada

### Contracting Entity

* **Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)**
* **11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec K1A 0S5, Canada**

### Contact Information

* **Rodnie Allison (SPAC/PSPC)**
* **rodnie.allison@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca**

### Tender Status

The tender is expiring on the specified tender closing date. Only qualified suppliers have been invited to bid.

-----
